content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]WHITENING SPECIAL :  
To make sure your smile will look as beautiful as you are on your wedding day,  schedule a complementary consultation. Your ultimate accessory that you and your bridal party can bring to the wedding is a pearly white smile. Don’t be one of the millions of people who did everything for their wedding day like buying flowers, gowns, getting a photographer, but in the end regretting not getting a beautiful smile. Your wedding photos will reflect your smile which everyone will remember for a lifetime.

 

Smile  Dental  Care offers Zoom 3, Laser and many other teeth whiting programs which will brighten your teeth on average of 8 shades whiter in just 45 minutes.

TEETH WHITENING :

Whitening of teeth can be divided into two main categories: In Office Power Assisted Whitening and Tray Whitening. All work well in experienced hands of our Cosmetic Dentist  with varying advantages such as speed, cost, and control of any sensitivity. We use :-
Power Assisted Whitening :
1) Chemical Only Whitening (Pola Office).
2) Light Activated (Zoom 3 Advanced power professional teeth whitening).
3) Laser Whitening.
ZOOM is an excellent method for whitening teeth. ZOOM is a system which uses light to activate and allow the bleach to more effectively penetrate the teeth.

LASER teeth whitening, like Zoom is also an expensive  method of  whitening with long lasting results. Bleach is applied to each tooth, and heat generated by a laser enhances its effectiveness while ultimately speeding up the process. This procedure uses a strong bleaching gel (hydrogen peroxide gel, 25 to 40 percent in concentration levels) that the laser activates and enhances for quick, dramatic results.
Tray Whitening :
The other method for whitening teeth is having custom made bleaching trays used with the  Zoom “Take Home Whitening Gel” and Colgate Visible white Kit.

Smile  Dental Care will create a picture perfect smile for you and your guests on your special day.

WEDDING PACKAGES :

Some Whitening Packages to create  Beautiful Smile Before Your Wedding Day are:

Zoom3  or  Laser  Whitening for Bridal Parties of   2 people.

Zoom3  or  Laser  Whitening for Bridal Parties of       2 – 4 people.

Zoom !  In one Weekend Professional Take Home Whitening Kit.

We recommend a professional teeth cleaning and dental exam prior to  teeth whitening.

BEAUTIFUL SMILES :
Smile  Dental Care has been involved in the bridal scene for many years and has participated in many bridal shows and events. Its a known fact – dentistry can change your life and take you to a bright future. A beautiful smile can make you feel  more self-confident, more youthful, and more energetic.

 

WEDDING SPECIAL :

During your hectic schedule making arrangements for flowers, invitations etc., schedule a dental appointment too ! Schedule your cosmetic dentistry consultations at least a year in advance so you’ll have time to make all the changes you want  before the wedding. Your wedding photos will reflect your smile which everyone will remember for a lifetime.

Here are the top tips every bride or groom needs to know about a beautiful smile for the Wedding Day:

  • A Bright smile will make you look beautiful on the outside and make you feel great on the inside.
  • One of the easiest things you can do to improve your smile is to have a regular checkup and cleaning every six months or more if needed.
  • A perfect smile can be ruined by gum disease, which causes red, swollen and puffy gums. A thorough cleaning and polishing at least 2 weeks before your wedding can ensure healthy gums and fresh breath for your big day.
  • Daily brushing and flossing will keep your gums healthy. Dental checkup may reveal any decay or worn fillings in the front teeth, which can cause brown spots or stains.
  • Bleaching is a must for anyone who wants a Quick, Painless, Bright Beautiful Smile Makeover.  If you decide to bleach your teeth make sure to avoid staining foods like tea, coffee, red wine and berries so your teeth will stay their brightest. If you choose trays or strips, do a touch up the night before your big day. Your teeth are always the whitest if you apply the trays or the strips the night before and the morning off your occasion.
  • Last minute tooth contouring allows cosmetic dentists correct minor defects in the shape and appearance of a tooth through a process referred to as tooth contouring or tooth reshaping.
  • For a complete smile makeover before your wedding you should consider all  other cosmetic dental treatments available to you.

Your beautiful smile will be a splendorous for everyone, making us feel honorable and reason to do give more awesome smiles ever.

 

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][stm_sidebar sidebar=”812″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
